trans-unit.source: Most hard disks do not need any configuring. If they do, the instructions are relatively simple.

seg-source.mrk: Most hard disks do not need any configuring.
If they do, the instructions are relatively simple.

target.mrk: Most hard disks do not need any configuring.
If they do, the instructions are relatively simple.

trans-unit.source: First check the documentation that came with your storage device. If the device requires configuring, follow the steps below.

seg-source.mrk: First check the documentation that came with your storage device.
If the device requires configuring, follow the steps below.

target.mrk: First check the documentation that came with your storage device.
If the device requires configuring, follow the steps below.

trans-unit.source: If your system recognizes the device, it may be able to configure it without help. If so, do not try and stop it.

seg-source.mrk: If your system recognizes the device, it may be able to configure it without help.
If so, do not try and stop it.

target.mrk: If your system recognizes the device, it may be able to configure it without help.
If so, do not try and stop it.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, your drive should come with software. Use this software to format and partition your drive.

seg-source.mrk: Otherwise, your drive should come with software.
Use this software to format and partition your drive.

target.mrk: Otherwise, your drive should come with software.
Use this software to format and partition your drive.

trans-unit.source: Once your drive is configured, restart the system. Just for fun. But be sure to remove any vendor software from your system before doing so.

seg-source.mrk: Once your drive is configured, restart the system.
But be sure to remove any vendor software from your system before doing so.

target.mrk: Once your drive is configured, restart the system.
But be sure to remove any vendor software from your system before doing so.
